function.name: trivia_api
function.description: Complete Open Trivia Database API access. Get trivia questions, manage categories, session tokens. 100% free, no API key required. Supports multiple choice and true/false questions across 24 categories.

amount.description: Number of questions to retrieve (get_questions only). Default: 10, min: 1, max: 50

category.description: Category ID for filtering questions (get_questions) or counting (get_category_count). Use list_categories to get IDs.

type.description: Question type: 'multiple' for multiple choice, 'boolean' for true/false (get_questions only)

encode.description: Text encoding type for questions/answers. Default: base64 (recommended for special characters)

token.description: Session token to avoid duplicate questions (get_questions) or to reset (reset_session_token). Create with create_session_token.
